property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever the Corp draws 1 or more cards, he or she loses 1[Credits] if it is not the first time he or she has drawn cards this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Once per turn, when you encounter a piece of ice, you may trash 1 card from your grip. If you do, that ice has -2 strength for the remainder of this run.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you approach a piece of ice, you may expose it. You may then trash GPI Net Tap to jack out.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the itsy-bitsy data is most important.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the Corp has at least 10[Credits], as an additional cost to rez each piece of ice, the Corp must spend credits equal to the number of subroutines on that ice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Take it from me, there is a point where you have so much money you stop caring. That's usually right before it all comes tumbling down."

property.name: Rules
property.value: +2[Memory Unit] Whenever you make a successful run on R&D, you may replace 1 spent recurring credit. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2[Credits]: Break all subroutines. Use this ability only by spending credits from stealth cards. 1[Credits]: +1 strength.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In running, as in reality, all elements are connected.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. Whenever you steal an agenda, force the Corp to "Trace0– If unsuccessful, the Runner gains credits equal to the number of agenda points in both players' score areas."

property.name: Faction
property.value: Sunny Lebeau

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Resolve two of the following in any order:
  • Gain 3[Credits].
  • Draw 2 cards.
  • Remove 1 tag.
  • Expose 1 piece of ice, then make a run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: <span class="champion">Designed by 2014 World Champion Dan D'Argenio</champion>

property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run and choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +2 strength for the remainder of this run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They call it "running" because jacking in is mentally and physically exhausting.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Code Gate-Bioroid

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner can spend [Click] to break any subroutine on Fairchild 1.0. [Subroutine]The Runner must pay 1[Credits] or trash 1 of his or her installed cards. [Subroutine]The Runner must pay 1[Credits] or trash 1 of his or her installed cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I foresee the end of all things...

property.name: Rules
property.value: The Runner can spend [Click][Click] to break up to 2 subroutines on Sherlock 2.0. [Subroutine]Trace4– If successful, add 1 installed program to the bottom of the Runner's stack. [Subroutine]Trace4– If successful, add 1 installed program to the bottom of the Runner's stack. [Subroutine]Give the Runner 1 tag.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first time each turn you reveal secretly spent credits, gain that many credits.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm telling you, free up the emergency accounts. Something's coming; I haven't seen a reaction like that since the tsunami. My god, the screaming..."

property.name: Rules
property.value: If Chrysalis is accessed from R&D, the Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Chrysalis, he or she encounters it. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Chrysalis from Archives. [Subroutine] Do 2 net damage.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Runner makes an unsuccessful run on this server, do 1 net damage. 2[Credits]: Move Georgia Emelyov to another server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your mistake is thinking that it's just business, when really it's a war."

property.name: Rules
property.value: The rez cost of the first piece of ice you rez each turn is lowered by 1 for each tag the Runner has.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Person of interest. Noun. Someone who is about to get ****ed by a corp." - Anarch's Dictionary, Volume Who's Counting

property.name: Rules
property.value: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Play only if the Runner made a run during his or her last turn. Trace4– If successful, give the Runner 4 tags.

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Controlling the Message

property.name: Rules
property.value: The first time the Runner trashes an installed Corp card each turn, you may trace4– If successful, give the Runner 1 tag (cannot be avoided).

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the Runner is tagged, Crisis Management gains "When your turn begins, do 1 meat damage."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For the duration of the emergency" is code for "this is the way things are now."

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: After you resolve this operation, end your action phase. Gain 3[Credits] for each agenda in the Runner's score area.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A stock dropping sharply is bad for shareholders, but not neccessarily bad for the company.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have at least 10[Credits], each piece of ice has +1 strength for every 5[Credits] in your credit pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Money is power.
